                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Originating Department

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Education

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Other Class Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Community-based Course

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Class Eligibility Rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Permission Required

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Major/Minor Restriction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Class Standing Restrictions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Class Exclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Prerequisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EDUC 1020, 1101, 020, or 101

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Co-requisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Equivalent Course(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EDUC 203 From Fall 1995 Through Spring 2013

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Registration Preferences for Spring Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1-junior majors/minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2-sophomores

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3-first years and senior majors/minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4-junior non-majors/minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              5-senior non-majors/minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Yes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An examination of the economic, social, political, and pedagogical implications of universal education in American classrooms. Focuses on the right of every child, including physically handicapped, learning disabled, and gifted, to equal educational opportunity. Requires a minimum of twenty-four hours of observation in a local secondary school.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Weekly 3-hour school observations required.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • CapacityActualRemainingPending Requests
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              252500FULL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Bowdoin Bookstore
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Registration Instructions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            EDUC 2211
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            20198
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Education and the Human Condition
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            cHumanities                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             		MW 11:30-12:55 PM Doris Santoro TBA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Associated Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Spring 2014

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Credits

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1.0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Separate Lab(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Originating Department

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Education

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Other Class Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Class Eligibility Rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Permission Required

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Major/Minor Restriction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Class Standing Restrictions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Must NOT have one of the following Class Standings --

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                First Year, First Semester

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Class Exclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Prerequisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Co-requisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Equivalent Course(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                EDUC 211 From Spring 2011 Through Fall 2011

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Registration Preferences for Spring Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1-majors and senior minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2-junior minors and senior non-majors/minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3-sophomores

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4-junior non-majors/minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Explores the relationship between education and being/becoming human. Topics may be guided by the questions: What does it mean to be an educated person? How can education lead to emancipation? How might teaching and learning lead to the good life? What is our responsibility to teach the next generation? Readings may include works by Hannah Arendt, John Dewey, W. E. B. Du Bois, Plato, Jacques Rancière, among others.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Required of all students who seek secondary public school certification, this final course in the student teaching sequence requires that students work full time in a local secondary school from early January to late April. Grading is Credit/D/Fail. Education 304 must be taken concurrently. Students must complete an application and interview.

Considers theoretical and practical issues related to effective classroom instruction.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Spring 2014

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Originating Department

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Education

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Other Class Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Community-based Option

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Class Eligibility Rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Permission Required

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Major/Minor Restriction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Class Standing Restrictions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Class Exclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Prerequisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Two courses: (EDUC 1020, 1101, 020, or 101) AND (EDUC 2000-2969 or 200-289)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Co-requisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Equivalent Course(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      EDUC 325 From Fall 2010 Through Spring 2013

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Registration Preferences for Spring Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1-senior majors/minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2-junior majors/minors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      3-everyone else

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Yes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An exploration of the educational techniques/methods that human beings have found, across cultures and time, to concentrate, broaden, and deepen awareness of thoughts, emotions, and bodily sensations. Holistic and interdisciplinary lens on the theory and processes of how people learn. Focus on educational models that encourage and foster mindful learning such as Montessori and Waldorf. Seminar-style dialogue on course readings complemented by contemplative practices such as yoga, meditation, tai chi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • CapacityActualRemainingPending Requests

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Bowdoin Bookstore
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Registration Instructions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Originating Department

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Education

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Other Class Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Class Eligibility Rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Permission Required

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Major/Minor Restriction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Must be declared in one of the following Majors —

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Education Studies, Mathematics and Education, Teaching

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Class Standing Restrictions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Class Exclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Prerequisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Four courses: (EDUC 1101 or 101) AND THREE OF: [(EDUC 2211, 2212, 2221, 2250, 3325, 211, 212, 221, 250, or 325) OR (GOV 2940 or 219)]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Co-requisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Equivalent Course(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Registration Preferences for Spring Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        All majors/minors equally

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Provides students with the opportunity to synthesize issues in educational studies addressed in previous coursework. Through an experiential project, students deepen their understanding of how schools both mirror and change the societies that create them. One-half credit. Grading is Credit/D/Fail.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • CapacityActualRemainingPending Requests
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        182160
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bowdoin Bookstore
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Registration Instructions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ENGL 1041
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      20211
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Arab and Jew in Literature and Film
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      cHumanities                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       		MW 11:30-12:55 PM Marilyn Reizbaum TBA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Associated Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Spring 2014

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Credits

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1.0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Separate Lab(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Originating Department

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        English

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Other Class Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Class Eligibility Rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Permission Required

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Major/Minor Restriction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Class Standing Restrictions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Must have one of the following Class Standings --

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          First Year, First Semester

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Class Exclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Prerequisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Co-requisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Equivalent Course(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ENGL 021 From Spring 2011 Through Spring 2011

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Registration Preferences for Spring Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          First years only

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Considers the interface between Arabs and Jews as produced on page and screen. Offers both geographical and generic range, bringing into view texts that talk to each other across ethnic, religious, historical, and theoretical boundaries. When these two figures are placed in relation to each other, they must invoke the Middle East, in particular Palestine-Israel: discusses works in translation, fiction and poetry, from the broad region, and may include authors Anton Shammas, Mahmoud Darwish, Ronit Matalon, Shimon Ballas, Haim Hazazz; writers in English such as Naomi Shihab Nye, Ammiel Alcalay, Philip Roth, Edward Said, and Ella Shohat; films by Elia Suleiman (Chronicle of a Disappearance), Khleifi (Wedding in Galilee), Gitai (Kippur), Abu-Assad (Paradise Now), Kolirin (The Band’s Visit), Kassovitz (Hate); and visual artists Mona Hatoum and Adi Nes.
