                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ENVS 1015
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                20323
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Frontier Crossings: The Western Experience in American History
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                		 HIST 1020
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                cHumanities                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 		MW 11:30-12:55 PM Matthew Klingle TBA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Associated Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    What accounts for the persistence of the “frontier myth” in American history, and why do Americans continue to find the idea so attractive? Explores the creation of and disputes over what became of the western United States from 1763 to the present. Topics include Euro-American relations with Native Americans; the creation of borders and national identities; the effect of nature and ideology; the role of labor and gender in the backcountry; and the enduring influence of frontier imagery in popular culture.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • CapacityActualRemainingPending Requests

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      An introduction to the physics of environmental issues, including past climates, anthropogenic climate change, ozone destruction, and energy production and efficiency.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Oceanography
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    		 EOS 1505
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    INSInquiry in Natural Sci
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    aNatural Science & Math                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     		TR 10:00-11:25 AM Collin Roesler TBA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Associated Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Spring 2014

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Credits

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1.0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Separate Lab(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Yes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Originating Department

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Earth and Oceanographic Sci

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Other Class Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Class Eligibility Rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Permission Required

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Major/Minor Restriction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Class Standing Restrictions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Class Exclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Prerequisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Co-requisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Equivalent Course(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ENVS 102 From Spring 2011 Through Spring 2013

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        EOS 102 From Spring 2011 Through Spring 2013

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        GEOL 102 From Fall 2009 Through Fall 2009

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Registration Preferences for Spring Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1-first years

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2-sophomores

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3-juniors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        4-seniors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The fundamentals of geological, physical, chemical, and biological oceanography: tectonic evolution of the ocean basins; sedimentation as a record of ocean history; global ocean circulation, waves, and tides; chemical cycles; ocean ecosystems and productivity; and the oceans’ role in climate change. Weekly labs and fieldwork demonstrate these principles in the setting of Casco Bay and the Gulf of Maine. Students complete a field-based research project on coastal oceanography.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • CapacityActualRemainingPending Requests
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        454500FULL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bowdoin Bookstore

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      aNatural Science & Math                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       		T 1:00-3:55 PM Cathryn Field TBA
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Associated Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Spring 2014

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Credits

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        0.0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Separate Lab(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Yes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Originating Department

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Earth and Oceanographic Sci

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Other Class Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Class Eligibility Rules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Permission Required

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Major/Minor Restriction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Class Standing Restrictions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Class Exclusion

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Prerequisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Co-requisite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Equivalent Course(s)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ENVS 102 From Spring 2011 Through Spring 2013

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          EOS 102 From Spring 2011 Through Spring 2013

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          GEOL 102 From Fall 2009 Through Fall 2009

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Registration Preferences for Spring Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1-first years

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2-sophomores

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3-juniors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4-seniors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The fundamentals of geological, physical, chemical, and biological oceanography: tectonic evolution of the ocean basins; sedimentation as a record of ocean history; global ocean circulation, waves, and tides; chemical cycles; ocean ecosystems and productivity; and the oceans’ role in climate change. Weekly labs and fieldwork demonstrate these principles in the setting of Casco Bay and the Gulf of Maine. Students complete a field-based research project on coastal oceanography.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • CapacityActualRemainingPending Requests

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The fundamentals of geological, physical, chemical, and biological oceanography: tectonic evolution of the ocean basins; sedimentation as a record of ocean history; global ocean circulation, waves, and tides; chemical cycles; ocean ecosystems and productivity; and the oceans’ role in climate change. Weekly labs and fieldwork demonstrate these principles in the setting of Casco Bay and the Gulf of Maine. Students complete a field-based research project on coastal oceanography.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fundamentals of geological, physical, chemical, and biological oceanography: tectonic evolution of the ocean basins; sedimentation as a record of ocean history; global ocean circulation, waves, and tides; chemical cycles; ocean ecosystems and productivity; and the oceans’ role in climate change. Weekly labs and fieldwork demonstrate these principles in the setting of Casco Bay and the Gulf of Maine. Students complete a field-based research project on coastal oceanography.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ENVS 104 From Spring 2011 Through Spring 2013

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                GEOL 100 From Fall 1993 Through Spring 2010

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                EOS 104 From Spring 2011 Through Spring 2013

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Registration Preferences for Spring Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1-first years

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2-sophomores

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3-juniors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4-seniors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                An introduction to aspects of geology and hydrology that affect the environment and land use. Topics include lakes, watersheds and surface-water quality, groundwater contamination, coastal erosion, and landslides. Weekly labs and fieldwork examine local environmental problems affecting Maine’s rivers, lakes, and coast. Students complete a community-based research project on Maine water quality. Formerly Geology 100 (same as Environmental Studies 100).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  An introduction to aspects of geology and hydrology that affect the environment and land use. Topics include lakes, watersheds and surface-water quality, groundwater contamination, coastal erosion, and landslides. Weekly labs and fieldwork examine local environmental problems affecting Maine’s rivers, lakes, and coast. Students complete a community-based research project on Maine water quality. Formerly Geology 100 (same as Environmental Studies 100).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    3-juniors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    4-seniors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    No

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    An introduction to aspects of geology and hydrology that affect the environment and land use. Topics include lakes, watersheds and surface-water quality, groundwater contamination, coastal erosion, and landslides. Weekly labs and fieldwork examine local environmental problems affecting Maine’s rivers, lakes, and coast. Students complete a community-based research project on Maine water quality. Formerly Geology 100 (same as Environmental Studies 100).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • CapacityActualRemainingPending Requests

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Bowdoin Bookstore

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Registration Preferences for Fall Term

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Registration Priority for Previously Shut Out

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Yes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Functioning of the earth system is defined by the complex and fascinating interaction of processes within and between four principal spheres: land, air, water, and life. Leverages key principles of environmental chemistry and ecology to unravel the intricate connectedness of natural phenomena and ecosystem function. Fundamental biological and chemical concepts are used to understand the science behind the environmental dilemmas facing societies as a consequence of human activities. Laboratory sessions consist of local field trips, laboratory experiments, group research, case study exercises, and discussions of current and classic scientific literature.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Class Comment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Functioning of the earth system is defined by the complex and fascinating interaction of processes within and between four principal spheres: land, air, water, and life. Leverages key principles of environmental chemistry and ecology to unravel the intricate connectedness of natural phenomena and ecosystem function. Fundamental biological and chemical concepts are used to understand the science behind the environmental dilemmas facing societies as a consequence of human activities. Laboratory sessions consist of local field trips, laboratory experiments, group research, case study exercises, and discussions of current and classic scientific literature.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Functioning of the earth system is defined by the complex and fascinating interaction of processes within and between four principal spheres: land, air, water, and life. Leverages key principles of environmental chemistry and ecology to unravel the intricate connectedness of natural phenomena and ecosystem function. Fundamental biological and chemical concepts are used to understand the science behind the environmental dilemmas facing societies as a consequence of human activities. Laboratory sessions consist of local field trips, laboratory experiments, group research, case study exercises, and discussions of current and classic scientific literature.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Course Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Functioning of the earth system is defined by the complex and fascinating interaction of processes within and between four principal spheres: land, air, water, and life. Leverages key principles of environmental chemistry and ecology to unravel the intricate connectedness of natural phenomena and ecosystem function. Fundamental biological and chemical concepts are used to understand the science behind the environmental dilemmas facing societies as a consequence of human activities. Laboratory sessions consist of local field trips, laboratory experiments, group research, case study exercises, and discussions of current and classic scientific literature.
